Extra Notes:
If the opponent techs when hitting the wall, the fireball is hitting too much (4th hit is the one that launches).
The j214B > j236D can be a bit tricky, you must input activate later than it seems.
When too far to reach corner with the fireball launch, you can set-up midscreen oki by using the following;
236D > 9D > 22C > 22B
Use B fireball for most of the cast
Use C fireball for;
Amane, Carl, Hibiki, Mai
Makoto requires 6C >~ j214C
Rachel requires 6C >~ j214A
This route does not work on Noel, or Valkenhayn

Sets up bunker bomb oki / tech trap
Catches rolls, allows IAD |> 22B safely while the bomb is exploding.
